name: Banjo Tiles
description:
Forget the piano - whip out your Banjo!

All the fun and challenge of the new App Store craze is back in banjo form! Keep up with the arcade-action gameplay and hear your authentic twangy banjo play familiar catchy tunes!

*NEW* Strum four notes at a time to play Chords in Pro mode! Another level of challenge for the best banjo players in the land.

Compete on the Game Center leaderboards, get all the achievements, and see if you can beat your friends' scores!

Download Banjo Tiles for FREE today!
